ble-role-observer.help: Include observer BLE role support, allows listening for and processing advertising packets.

ble-role-broadcaster.help: Include broadcaster BLE role support, allows sending advertising packets.

ble-role-central.help: Include central BLE role support, depends on broadcaster role.

ble-role-peripheral.help: Include peripheral BLE role support, depends on observer role.

ble-feature-gatt-client.help: Include Gatt Client BLE role support, depends on peripheral and central role.

ble-feature-gatt-server.help: Include Gatt Server BLE role support, depends on peripheral or central role.

ble-feature-security.help: Include security BLE role support, depends on peripheral or central role.

ble-feature-secure-connections.help: Include secure connections support, depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-signing.help: Include signing support, depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-whitelist.help: Include whitelist support, depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-privacy.help: Include privacy support, depends on the security feature.

ble-feature-extended-advertising.help: Include extended advertising support, depends on the phy management feature.

ble-feature-periodic-advertising.help: Include periodic advertising support, depends on the extended advertising feature.
